root.name: Magical Hat
root.description: IntroductionMagical Hat Turbo Adventure is Japanese Sega Megadrive Game released in Japan in 1990. The game is based on an anime called Magical Hat. Due to licensing problems outside of Japan, the game was remade into Decap Attack for release outside of Japan.GameplayYou control a turban wearing boy that can punch and throw an egg to kill enemies. The game contains seven worlds which have three levels each. You progress by scrolling your character from left to right and up and down the levels. At the end of each world you can play one of two bonus rounds. In one of the bonus rounds you place bets along different paths and watch your character walk along these paths to reach a prize. The second bonus round is a slot machine game.
